src_text: Leswintshwa hi Vuvabyi bya Khoronavhayirasi (COVID-19)
trg_text: Update on the Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19)

src_text: Khabinete yi amukela ku ehla eka nhlayo ya timhangu ta COVID-19 leti tiyisisiweke emavhikini mangarimangani lama nga hundza na mpimo wa nhlakarhelo lowu antsweke lowu wu engeteleke kufika eka 87%.
trg_text: Cabinet welcomes the drop in the number of new confirmed COVID-19 cases over the past few weeks and the improved recovery rate that has increased to 87 percen The number of people requiring admission in our hospitals and the demand for COVID-19 tests have also droppe

src_text: Nhlayo ya vanhu lava lavaka ku amukeriwa eswibedhlele swa hina na ku laviwa ka swikambelo swa COVID-19 na swona swi ehlil
trg_text: This is to continue giving effect to the regulations that remain relevant to manage the spread of COVID-19 infection

src_text: Khabinete yi khensa maAfrika-Dzonga hinkwavo eka ku tlanga xiphemu xa vona eka ku landzelela swipimelo ku hunguta nhlayo ya timhango letintshw Hi hoyozela vutiyimiseri na vutitsoni bya vatirhi va swa rihanyo hinkwavo lava veke eka vusirheleri bya hina vuthu ra le mahlweni ehenhla ka xitsongwatsongwana lex
trg_text: Cabinet thanks all South Africans for playing their part in adhering to restrictions to flatten the curv We commend the dedication and sacrifice of all health professionals who have been our frontline defence against the viru

src_text: A hi akeni ehenhla ka nkhinkhi wa mahungu lamo tiyisa nhlana na ku ya emahlweni hi tirhisana hi ndlela yo fanana ku endla swilo leswinene, swo tanihi ku siya mpfhukanyana exikarhi ka vanhu, ku ambala xipfalaxikandza loko hi ri evanhwini, na ku hlamba swandla hi xisibi na mati kumbe ku tirhisa xibasisaswandla lexi nga na xihok
trg_text: Let us build on the momentum of this encouraging news and continue to work together to consistently do the right things, such as practising social distancing, wearing a mask when in public, and washing hands with soap and water or using an alcohol-based hand sanitise

src_text: Khabinete yi hlohlotela vanhu hinkwavo eAfrika-Dzonga ku dawuniloda Xitirhisiwa xa COVID Alert SA xa mahala kusuka eka Apple App Store kumbe Google Pla Ndzawulo ya Rihanyo yi tivise app leyi tanihi xitirho xin'wana xo lemukisa maAfrika-Dzonga loko va vile eka xiyimo laha ku nga na munhu loyi a nga na COVID-19.
trg_text: Cabinet encourages all people in South Africa to download the free COVID Alert SA Application from the Apple App Store or Google Pla The Department of Health introduced the app as another tool to alert South Africans if they have been exposed to someone with COVID-19.

src_text: App leyi yi tiyisa nyimpi ya rixaka ra ka hina ku lwisana na ku hangalaka ka xitsongwatsongwana lex
trg_text: The app strengthens our nation s fight against the spread of the viru

src_text: Khabinete yi tlhele yi engetela xiyimo xa rixaka xa mhangu kuya eka 15 Nhlangula 2020 hi ku landza Xiyenge xa 27(5)(c) xa Nawu wa Malawulelo ya Timhangu, 2002 (57 wa 2002).
trg_text: Cabinet also approved the extension of the national state of disaster to 15 October 2020 in terms of Section 27(5)(c) of the Disaster Management Act, 2002 (57 of 2002).

src_text: Leswi swi ta ya emahlweni swi humelerisa swinawana leswi tshamaka swa ha fambelana na ku lawula ku hangalaka ka mitluletavuvabyi ya COVID-19.
trg_text: The recent AG Report also highlighted some irregularities and illegal transactions on the COVID-19 relief package introduced by government to ease economic distress and prevent the spread of the viru

src_text: Madzolonga yo ya hi rimbewu (GBV) Maxangu ya GBV ya ya emahlweni ya xanisa rixaka ra ka hina hi ku himeteriwa ka tihanyi to pfumala mongo na ku ku dlayiwa ka vavasat Vaxanisiwa lava ha ku vaka kona va vugevenga lebya tihanyi va katsa mutlangi wa le ka thelevhixini Thandeka Mdeliswa (34) loyi a baleseriweke ekaya ka vona eEvander, Mpumalanga na wansati wa 28 wa malembe hi vukhale loyi a dlayiweke hi nuna wakwe loko a ri karhi a mangala nandzu wa madzolonga ya le mindyangwini eka Xitichi xa Maphorisa xa Madeira e Kapa-Vuhumadyamb Khabinete yi kombela vululami ku va byi humelerisiwa eka vugevenga lebyi na le ka byin'wana lebyi byi mangariwek Khabinete ya ha ku pasisa milawu yinharhu ku tiyisa nyimpi ya ku lwisana na GB Yona i Nawumbisi wo Hundzuluxa wa Madzolonga ya le Mindyangwini; Nawumbisi wo Hundzuluxa wa Vugevenga na Timhaka leti Fambelanaka wa 2020; na Nawumbisi wo Hundzuluxa Nawu wa Vugevenga (Milandzu ya swa Masangu na Timhaka leti Fambelanaka ) wa 2020.
trg_text: The scourge of GBV continues to plague our nation with the senseless violent assault and murder of wome The recent victims of this heinous crime include actress Thandeka Mdeliswa (34) who was shot at her family home in Evander, Mpumalanga and the 28-year-old woman who was killed by her husband while reporting a domestic violence at the Madeira Police Station in the Eastern Cap Cabinet calls for justice to be served on these crimes and others that are reporte

src_text: Milawu leyi yi ta hoxa xandla eka ku tiyisisa leswaku ku va na nsirhelelo lowu tirhaka kahle na ku nga tlangisi swipfuno eka vaxanisiwa va madzolonga ya le mindyangwini na GB

src_text: Khabinete yi kombela tiejensi hinkwato to navetisa ta Clicks na mavhengele man'wana leswaku na tona ti amukela minongonoko yo khomeka leyi yi kondletelaka na ku sirhelela timfanelo ta ximunhu, na ku tlakusa vulemukisi hi mayelena na swiphiqo leswa manyala swa xihlawuhlawu xo ya hi nghohe, nkandzingano na xihlawuhlaw
trg_text: Cabinet calls on the advertising agencies of Clicks and other stores to also adopt tangible programmes which promote and protect human rights, and raise awareness about despicable issues of racism, inequality and discriminatio

src_text: Tisekitara hinkwato ta rixaka ra ka hina ti boheka ku seketela swinakulobye exikarhi ka tindzawulo ta mfumo na mihlangano ya Kavanyisa ka Kaye eka ku simeka mapfhumba ya dyondzo yo lwisana na xihlawuhlawu xo ya hi nghohe na yo lwisana na xihlawuhlaw Hi ku ringana, mfumo wu tsundzuxa maAfrika-Dzonga hinkwavo leswaku mfanelo ya ku vulavula ku kanetana na nkavululami wihi kumbe wihi ku ri hava nchavo wa ndzihiseto yi hlamuseriwile eka Vumbiw Hambiswiritano, mfanelo ya ku kombisa ku vilela yi ta na vutihlamuleri lebyi fambisanaka swin'we bya ku endla tano hi ku rhula naswona ku ri hava ku onha timfanelo ta van'wan Mfumo wu sola swiendlo swa ku onheteriwa ka nhundzu emavhengeleni ya Click Swiendlo leswi nga riki enawini swo tano swi chicha xiyimo xa moya wa timfanelo ta ximunhu leti ti vumbeke tiko leri kusukela loko ku vile na xidemokiras
trg_text: Equally, government reminds all South Africans that the right to speak out against any injustice without fear of reprisal is enshrined in our Constitutio However, the right to protest comes with the inherent responsibility to do so peacefully and without infringing on the rights of other Government condemns the acts of vandalism at Clicks store Such unlawful acts undermine the spirit of human rights that has shaped this country since the dawn of democrac

src_text: Afrika-Dzonga yi le ku tirheleni ku kurisa ikhonomi naswona yi nge swi koti ku xungeta ku lahlekeriwa hi mitirho hikwalaho ka ku pfaleteriwa ka mabindz Ku nga landzeleriwi ka nawu na ku onheteriwa ka nhundzu leyi nga riki ya mfumo na ya mfumo a swi fanelangi ku tsetseleriwa tanihileswi swi nga riki xihlawuriwa xa vutihlamuleri na ku va xa nhluvuko xa ku ololoxa ntlimb 4. khonomi Ku khanyana lokukulu ka Swikumiwa swa Tiko Hinkwaswo swa Kotara ya 2 ku rhekoda tilevhele ta 16,4% leti endliweke ta lembe na lembe kufika eka 51,2% hikwalaho ka COVID-19, swi tlakusa nxungeto wa ku fikelela mvhumbo wa Mpimanyeto wo Engetela wa - ta ku kula hi 2020.
trg_text: South Africa is working towards growing the economy and cannot afford to risk the loss of jobs due to business closure Lawlessness and vandalism of private and public property should not be condoned as they are not a responsible and progressive option to resolve a conflic 4.

src_text: Leswi swi tiyisa ku lulama ka xiboho xa mfumo xa ku tirhisa hi ku hatlisa kungu ra nhlakarhelo wa ikhonomi, ku ri karhi ku tirhisaniwa na vatirhisani va hina lava nga eka xinakulobye hinkwavo ku veka ikhonomi eka ndlela ya ku kula yo antsw Kungu leri, leri ri nga ta rhangeriwa hi swimakiwakulu, ri ta tlhela ri katsa nsimeko wa mipfuxeto ya swivumbeko leyi dingiwaka swonghas 5.
trg_text: This affirms the correctness of government s decision to urgently embark on an economic recovery plan, working together with all our social partners to get the economy on a better growth trajector

src_text: Swikumiwa leswi swi katsa ku tlakusiwa kutlula mpimo ka mixavo, vatirhelamfumo va endla swikombelo swa mphalalo leswi a va nga fanelangi ku swi kuma, vumbabva lebyi nga tshukaka byi va kona na ku ceceleta milawu na swinawana swa malawulelo ya nkhuluko wa tinhundzu na vukorhoker Khabinete yi tshikelela vutiyimiseri bya yona ku ya emahlweni yi hlongorisa kufika emakumu hinkwavo lava kumekaka va tirhisile timali hi ndlela yo homboloka swi nga ri na mhaka leswaku hi vona vaman Ku hambana loku paluxiweke hi vaaki hi vuxokoxoko lebyi kandziyisiweke eka webusayiti ya Vutamelankwama bya Rixaka (wwtreasurgoza) ku ta landzelerisiwa na tindzawulo leti fanelek

src_text: Swiboho swa Khabinete 1.
trg_text: Cabinet decisions 1.

src_text: Miphalalo ya ku Cinca ka Tlilayimete ya Rixaka Khabinete yi pasise ku tumbuluxiwa ka Khomixini yo Kondletela ku Cinca ka Tlilayimete ya le Hofisini ya Phuresident Leswi swi fambisana na Ntwanano wa Rimba ra Samiti ya Mitirho wa le Hofisini ya Phuresidente lowu sayiniweke hi nkarhi wa Samiti ya Mitirho ya le Hofisini ya Phuresidente hi 2018.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the establishment of the Presidential Climate Change Coordinating Commissio This is in line with the Presidential Job Summit Framework Agreement signed during the Presidential Job Summit in 2018.

src_text: Khomixini yi ta kondletela ku cinca lokunene ka tiko ra ka hina eka tlilayimente ya moyakhubu wa le hansi na ikhonomi na rixaka leswi kondzelelaka hi kwalomuya ka va 2052.
trg_text: The commission will coordinate the just transition of our country to a low carbon climate and resilient economy and society by 2052.

src_text: Xivumbeko lexi xi ta yimeriwa hi mfumo, vatirhisani lava nga eka xinakulobye, vaaki lava nga na ku tsakela kun'we, vativinkulu kusuka eka swidyondzeki na mihlangano ya ndzavisis
trg_text: The structure will be represented by government, social partners, civil society as well as experts from academia and research institution

src_text: Afrika-Dzonga i musayini eka Ntwanano wa Rimba ra Vun'we bya Tinxaka eka ku Cinca ka Tlilayimete (UNFCCC).
trg_text: South Africa is the signatory to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC).

src_text: Qhinga ra Nhluvukiso wa Swithyakisamoya swa le Hansi (LED) ra tiko

src_text: eka Hofisi ya Vamatsalani ya UNFCC Qhinga lera LED ri ta antswisa pholisi ya ku cinca ka tlilayimete na nhluvukiso ya rixaka hi mukhuva lowu tirhisanaka, lowu khomaneke na ku va wa xiqhinga swinen Ri nyika magoza yo hunguta lama kongomisaka eka mune wa tisekitarakulu ta ikhonomi, ku nga Eneji; Vumaki; Vurimi, Swihlahla na Ntirhiso wa Misava; na Thyak 2.
trg_text: Cabinet also approved the submission of the country s Low Emission Development (LED) Strategy to the UNFCCC Secretaria This LED Strategy will advance the national climate change and development policy in a more coordinated, coherent and strategic manne It provides mitigation measures focusing on four key sectors of the economy, namely Energy; Industry; Agriculture, Forestry and Land Use; and Wast 2.

src_text: Qhinga ra Malawulelo ya Thyaka ra Rixaka (NWMS) ra 2020 Khabinete yi pasise NWMS ya 2020 ku siva NWMS ya 2011.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the 2020 NWMS to replace the 2011 NWM The waste management strategy gives into effect the terms of the National Environmental Management: Waste Act, 2008 (Act 59 of 2008).

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise ku rhumeriwa ka Xiviko xa 2017/18 ePalamende hi Nongonoko wa Hunguto wa Xibalo xa R& Ndzavisiso lowu wu landzelerisa matirhiselo ya hunguto lowu hi tikhamphani ku kondletela ndzavisiso na nhluvukiso leswi nga endzeni ka tisekitara ta ton Nongonoko lowu wa hunguto wa xibalo wu tivisiwile rosungula hi Hukuri 2006.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the 2017/18 Report to Parliament on R&D Tax Incentive Programm The research tracks usage of the incentive by companies to promote research and development within their respective sector This tax incentive programme was first introduced in November 2006.

src_text: Hi ku ya hi xiviko lexi, kusuka hi Hukuri 2006 kufika hi Nyenyanyana 2018, ehenhla ka 1 091 wa tikhamphani leti ti endleke swikombelo swa nseketelo, 902 ti nyikiwile hunguto lowu wa xibal Xiviko xa vutalo xi ta fikeleriwa xikan'wekan'we loko xi andlariwa ePalamend
trg_text: According to the report, from November 2006 to February 2018, out of 1 091 companies which applied for support, 902 were granted this tax incentiv The full report will be accessible once presented in Parliamen

src_text: Ncinco eka Riandlalo ra Ndzaka Khabinete yi nyikiwile vuxokoxoko hi ndzima leyi khatsiweke hi xipano xa xintirhwana xo kanerisana leri rhangeriweke hi Ndzawulo ya Mitlangu, Vutshila na Mfuwo hi ncinco eka riandlalo ra ndzhak Xipano lexi a xi fanele ku kambisisa hi riandlalo ra ndzhaka ra nkarhi wa sweswi, na hilaha Khabinete yi angulaka hakona eka mikhuvanene ya nkarhi lowu nga hundza na ku va ya nkoka swonghasi ya Vumbiwa ra hin
trg_text: Cabinet was briefed on the progress made by the consultative task team led by the Department of Sport, Arts and Culture on the transformation of the heritage landscap The team was to reflect on the current heritage landscape, and how Cabinet responds to the historical and critical values of our Constitutio

src_text: Xipano lexi xi endla swibumabumelo swa switsundzuxo swo yimisiwa leswi swi faneleke ku amukela mikhuvanene ya masungulo ya Afrika-Dzonga leyintshw Xi ringanyeta ku rhurhisiwa ka swin'wana swa switsundzuxo swo yimisiwa swa nkarhi lowu nga hundza ku yisiwa eka mitanga ya mikongomelo leyi yi nga ta kumeka etikweni hinkwar Oditi ya vutalo ya switsundzuxo swo yimisiwa na mifungho hinkwayo yi ta endliwa naswona mbuyelo wa kona wu ta letela ku kumiwa ka mitanga yo akiwa ka rixaka ya mfumo leyi ringanyetiwak
trg_text: Cabinet reiterates its resolve to continue to decisively pursue all those found to have abused these funds irrespective of who they ar The discrepancies that are exposed by the public through the information published on the National Treasury website (wwtreasurgoza) will be followed up with the relevant department

src_text: VuhoyozeriKhabinete yi hundzisa vuhoyozeri bya yona na ku navelela leswinene eka:
trg_text: All sectors of our society must endorse partnerships between government departments and Chapter Nine institutions in implementing anti-racism and anti-discrimination educational campaign

src_text: khale ka Mulawuri-Jenerala (DG) eka Hofisi ya Phuresidente tlhelo Matsalana wa Khabinete, Dkd Cassius Lubisi, tanihiloko a ri karhi a huma eka Vutirhelamfumo ku huma phenceni endzhaku ka ku tirha tanihi mutirhelamfumo wa xikombiso lexinene eka Hofisi ya Phuresidente na le KwaZulu-Nata Dkd Lubisi u siyela vanhu va Afrika-Dzonga ndzhaka ya vukorhokeri bya matikhomelonene, bya xiphurofexinali na ku va bya xitiyanhlan khale ka DG ya Ndzawulo ya Rihanyo, Dkd Precious Matsoso, eka ku thoriwa ka yena tanihi xirho xa phanele eka Phanele leyi Tiyimelaka ya Nhlangano wa Matiko ya Misava ya Vulungheki na Angulo wa Mitungukul 2.
trg_text: The steep contraction of our Quarter 2 Gross Domestic Product to record levels of 16,4% annualized to 51,2% as a result of COVID-19, raises the risk of reaching the Supplementary Budget forecast of - growth in 2020.

src_text: MichaveleloKhabinete yi rhumela michavelelo eka: vandyangu na vanghana va mutlhokovetseri loyi a ndhundhuzeriwaka swinene tlhelo mugingiriki wa swa tipolitiki Ttn Achmat Dangor loyi a tirhiseke swikili swa yena swa vutsari ku paluxa nkavululami wa mfumo wa xihlawuhlawu na ku nyika rito eka lava pfumalaka rit
trg_text: Draft White Paper on Audio and Visual Content Services Policy Framework

src_text: vandyangu, vanghana na vatirhikulobye va Mnn Nyameka Goniwe, Xipikara xa Masipala wa Inxuba Yethemba eKapa-Vupeladyambu na noni ya mugingiriki wa Vulwelantshunxeko, Tatana Matthew Goniw vandyangu na vanghana va Muhandzuri-Jenerala wa Vuthu ra Vusirheleri ra Rixaka ra Afrika-Dzonga, Luthenente-Jenerala Vejay Ramlakan, loyi a hume phenceni, loyi a nga tlhela hoxa xandla eka ntshunxeko wa maAfrika-Dzonga hinkwav vandyangu na vanghana va Ttn Petrus Meyer, loyi tiveka hi ku rhandzeka tanihi Oom Piet, wa Kapa-Vupeladyambu, na Muyimelatiko Hosi Mohlamme Piet Mathebe na Ttn David Mbulaheni Malada wa Limpop MaAfrika-Dzonga lavo xiximeka va nyikete vutomi bya vona eka nyimpi yo lwela ntshunxeko na xidemokirasi eAfrika-Dzong
trg_text: Auditor-General Report (AG) on COVID-19 procurements

src_text: vandyangu na vanghana va mugingirikeli wa timfanelo ta ximunhu loyi a tiveka swonghasi Gqwethankulu George Bizos, loyi a hundzeke emisaveni a ri na malembe ya 92 hi vukhal A ri nhenha ya nyimpi yo lwisana na mfumo wa xihlawuhlawu eAfrika-Dzong Adv Bizos u tirhe tanihi mutsundzuxi wa swa nawu wa Nelson Mandela ku ringana malembe lamo tala naswona a ri un'wana wa phanele ya magqwetha lama yimeleke vasirheleriwa eka Mutengo wa Rivoni
trg_text: The plan, which will be infrastructure led, will also include implementation of much-needed structural reform 5.

src_text: A ri gqwetha ra timfanelo ta ximunhu leri a ri tlangeriwa naswona a tlhela a va xirho xa vasunguri va Senthara ya Swipfuno swa Nawu, nhlangano wa timfanelo ta ximunh
trg_text: National Waste Management Strategy (NWMS) 2020

src_text: Ku thoriwaKu thoriwa hinkwako ku fanele ku yisiwa eka vutiyisisi bya mithwaso na mbhaso lowu fanelek 1.

src_text: Luthenente-Jenerala Tebello Constance Mosikili tanihi Xandla xa Nhloko ya Rixaka ya Ndzawulotsongo ya Vulavisisi bya Vugevenga bya Xirhangana Ttn Trevor Rammitiwa tanihi Muofisirinkulu wa Vurhangerinkulu wa Vandla ra Swihangalasamahungu swa Xielekitironiki ra Rixaka ra Afrika-Dzong Swivutiso: Mnn Phumla Williams
